txt.en:
'Hethuwen took a closer look at that sample you gathered earlier and found some troubling results. Evidently, the source of the substance is a living creature!

'If this creature is allowed to persist, it will surely endanger the efforts of the hardy dwarves here in the Water-works, and perhaps in all of Moria. I have a plan, [placeholder], that is sure to help us, but it will take some time to set it in motion.

'We shall bait the creature from out of its hiding place, and I have reason to believe it will be very large. A large stock of ingredients will be needed to prepare a lure that will be sufficiently appetizing. Speak with me again, and I'll let you know what I need. Oh, and...spread the word around to any friends who are fit to assist you. We will be needing rather a lot of ingredients.'
'Excellent; now, let's get started.  There is much to do and many items we need to prepare.'

'I can't thank you enough for your help, [placeholder].  Your work here throughout Moria has exposed a mystery far more dreadful than I could have forseen.

'I'm still trying to figure out just what I'll need to solve this problem; but rest assured that I will.

'Give me some time to sort out what I'll need and then return to me later.  I suspect that there will be even more work for us to do in the days ahead.'
Hasta has let you know of his plans to deal with mysterious creature who lurks behind some unpleasant rumours in the Water-works.
Hasta is in the Rotting Cellar in the Water-works of Moria.\n\nYou should speak with Hasta to find out what he will need to prepare a lure for the creature behind the disturbing rumours.
